class YardDatabase

Detailed Description

The YardSale Carrier Type is a OO representation of the datebase package table. 

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS Carrier_Table;

CREATE TABLE Carrier_Table(
    CRR_ID              INT AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
    CRR_Name            varchar(50),
    CRR_Pickup_Location     TEXT,
    CRR_Phone_Number        varchar(20),
    Primary Key (CRR_ID),
    UNIQUE(CRR_Name)
)type=InnoDB
See also:

Michael Swigon
